result.eng: She explained the reasons to me.
result.html: mhínigh sí na cúiseanna domShe explained the reasons to me.
result.ponchtml: ṁíniġ sí na cúiseanna domShe explained the reasons to me.

result.eng: For many reasons, this country is divided into two states.
